

snap(-40,-40,-40)


sky(0,128,128)
fog(0,213,213)
ground(5,88,62)
polys(4,68,48)

fadefrom(7000)

density(4)
lightson()

name(Night Demons)

nlaps(5)

set(47,0,0,0)p
chk(40,0,1500,0)
set(10,0,5600,0)p
set(26,0,8400,0)pr
set(10,0,11200,0)p
set(10,0,16800,0)p
set(37,0150,17600,0)
set(38,0000,17600,0)
set(37,-150,17600,0)
set(30,0,19600,180)pr
set(10,0,22400,0)p
set(10,0,28000,0)p
set(14,0,32550,0)pt
chk(40,1750,32550,90)p
set(10,4550,32550,90)
set(14,9100,32550,-90)pt
set(10,9100,28000,0)p
set(31,9100,25200,180)pr
set(10,9100,22400,0)p
set(20,9100,16800,0)p

set(15,9100,11200,0)p
set(15,9100,5600,0)p
set(15,9100,0,0)p
set(17,9100,-4550,180)pt
chk(42,7350,-4550,90)
set(17,5600,-4550,90)pt
set(15,5600,0,0)po
set(33,5600,2800,0)pr
set(15,5600,5600,0)p
set(33,5600,8400,0)pr
set(15,5600,11200,0)p
fix(41,5600,5600,-600,0)s

set(20,5600,16800,0)p
set(10,5600,22400,0)p
set(29,5600,26950,0)pr
set(29,5600,26950,180)pr
set(23,5600,28450,180)p

set(37,5750,38250,0)
set(38,5600,38250,0)
set(37,5450,38250,0)

set(23,5600,38750,0)p
set(30,5600,40250,180)pr
set(10,5600,44800,0)p
set(14,5600,49350,-90)pt
set(10,1050,49350,90)p
chk(40,1050,49350,90)
set(14,-3500,49350,0)pt
set(10,-3500,44800,0)p
set(32,-3200,44800,180)pr
set(32,-3500,44800,180)pr
set(32,-3800,44800,180)pr
fix(41,-3500,42000,-600,0)s
set(10,-3500,39200,0)p
set(10,-3500,33600,0)p
set(10,-3500,28000,0)p
set(31,-3500,29600,180)pr
set(10,-3500,22400,0)p
set(10,-3500,16800,0)p
set(10,-3500,11200,0)p

set(37,-3350,10400,0)
set(38,-3500,10400,0)
set(37,-3650,10400,0)

set(30,-3500,8400,0)pr
set(10,-3500,5600,0)p
set(10,-3500,0,0)p
set(14,-3500,-4550,90)pt
chk(40,-1750,-4550,90)
set(14,0,-4550,180)pt


maxr(13,12000,-6000)
maxb(7,-8400,-12800)
maxt(7,52600,-12800)
maxl(13,-8200,-6000)
